languages.text: {n}Священник спокойно кивает.{/n} "Все верно. Я — закоренелый мерзавец и грешник. Обнимемся, {mf|брат|сестра}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Священник спокойно кивает.{/n} "Все верно. Я — закоренелый мерзавец и грешник. Обнимемся, {mf|брат|сестра}?"

languages.text: {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am a wicked, irredeemable scoundrel. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Священник спокойно кивает.{/n} "Все верно. Я — закоренелый мерзавец и грешник. Обнимемся, {mf|брат|сестра}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am an irredeemable scoundrel and a sinner. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"
{n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am an irredeemable scoundrel and a sinner. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"
{n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am an irredeemable scoundrel and a sinner. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"
{n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am an irredeemable scoundrel and a sinner. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"
{n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am a wicked, irredeemable scoundrel. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"

languages.text: {n}他平静地点点头。{/n}“你说得没错，我是个无可救药的恶棍。我们可以拥抱一下吗，我的{mf|兄弟|姐妹}？”
languages.original_text: {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am a wicked, irredeemable scoundrel. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他平静地点点头。{/n}“你说得没错，我是个无可救药的恶棍，罪人。我们可以拥抱一下吗，我的{mf|兄弟|姐妹}？”

languages.text: {n}Asiente con calma.{/n} «Tiene razón. Soy un canalla y un granuja sin remedio. ¿Nos abrazamos, {mf|hermano|hermana}?».
languages.original_text: {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am a wicked, irredeemable scoundrel. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Asiente con calma.{/n} «Tiene razón. Soy un canalla y un pecador sin remedio. ¿Nos abrazamos, {mf|hermano|hermana}?».

languages.text: {n}彼は静かにうなずいた。{/n}「おっしゃるとおりです。私は救いようのない悪党です。抱擁を交わしましょうか、同志よ？」
languages.original_text: {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am a wicked, irredeemable scoundrel. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は静かにうなずいた。{/n}「おっしゃるとおりです。私は救いようのない悪党です。抱擁を交わしましょうか、同志よ？」

languages.text: {n}Er nickt besonnen.{/n} "Ihr habt durchaus recht. Ich bin ein gottloser, unverbesserlicher Schurke. Wollen wir einander umarmen, {mf|Bruder|Schwester}?"
languages.original_text: {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am a wicked, irredeemable scoundrel. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er nickt besonnen.{/n} "Ihr habt durchaus recht. Ich bin ein rettungslos verlorener Schurke und Sünder. Wollen wir einander umarmen, {mf|Bruder|Schwester}?"

languages.text: {n}Il hoche la tête calmement.{/n} « Vous avez tout à fait raison. Je suis un vaurien impénitent. Allons-nous nous serrer dans les bras, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am a wicked, irredeemable scoundrel. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il acquiesce calmement.{/n} « Vous avez tout à fait raison. Je suis un vaurien impénitent et un pécheur. Allons-nous nous serrer dans les bras, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur} ? »

languages.text: {n}Başıyla sakince onaylıyor.{/n} "Çok haklısın. Ben kötü, kurtuluş şansı olmayan bir alçağım. Kucaklaşalım mı kardeşim?"
languages.original_text: {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "You are quite right. I am a wicked, irredeemable scoundrel. Shall we embrace, {mf|brother|sister}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sakince onaylıyor.{/n} "Çok haklısın. Ben kötü, kurtuluş şansı olmayan bir alçağım. Sana sarılabilir miyim kardeşim?"
